user_sentiment: moderately satisfied but ready to move forward
execution_quality: Thorough investigation with good problem identification, but implementation was not completed as requested in the follow-up message. The agent identified what needed to be done but didn't execute it before awaiting further instructions.
work_category: Feature implementation and compatibility investigation for an Emacs package manager. The agent created documentation, investigated tmux compatibility gaps, and prepared implementation for new features.
summary: The agent successfully completed the investigation phase of the request (readme, packaging, tmux compatibility analysis) but did not implement the identified features as the user expected. The follow-up message indicates the user wanted implementation to proceed immediately with their guidance on design decisions (session cleanup scoping, workspace creation), suggesting misalignment on whether investigation alone was sufficient or implementation should have been started proactively.
follow_up_pattern: User is issuing a continuation instruction with specific implementation details and feature refinements, indicating they accepted the investigation results and want to proceed with implementation immediately.
